title: Top-Rated Spacious Apartment Stay in the Heart of Adelaide
description:
Not all city escapes are made the same and after an ultra-stylish stay at Miller Apartments Adelaide, you’ll soon discover what an unforgettable urban escape should be. This top-rated property - currently ranked in Adelaide's top five properties on Tripadvisor - is superbly located right in the heart of the action, close to Adelaide Oval and Rundle Mall, making it the perfect base for couples seeking a romantic escape or groups looking to discover the city in style.

Slip into the cosmopolitan rhythm of the capital as you explore the burgeoning small-bar and restaurant scene, roam through exceptional shopping precincts and get a taste for world-class cultural experiences within moments of your doorstep. When you're not discovering the likes of the Art Gallery of South Australia or Adelaide Central Market, recharge at Miller Apartments Adelaide, where you'll find an onsite fitness centre plus complimentary access to a nearby Goodlife Gym and convenient undercover parking for day trips to the Adelaide Hills or the vine-laced Barossa Valley.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Toast your escape with a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival
- Indulge your sweet side with complimentary welcome chocolates
- Forget about parking woes with complimentary secure parking for one vehicle
- Make the most of your stay with late 12pm checkout

**Want to make your stay extra special?** Upgrade to the One-Bedroom Executive Suite or sky-high Two-Bedroom Executive Suite and receive a five-course dinner for two including sparkling wine.

**This deal has NO surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.
offer_address: 16 Hindley Street Adelaide SA 5000 Australia

title: Award-Winning Adelaide Luxury Suites with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
An escape to South Australia’s beguiling capital beckons with a sophisticated five-star suite stay at the glamorous The Playford Adelaide - MGallery Collection. Inspired by the city's rich artistic heritage, this hotel dazzles with art-nouveau touches, gilded accents and bespoke hospitality unlike anywhere else.

The facilities are exceptional - savour pared-back European-inspired dishes served with modern flair at Luma Restaurant & Bar (awarded One Chef Hat by The Australian Good Food Guide in 2025) or head to Health Club for a dip in the hotel's magnificent indoor pool.

Surrounded by parks and tree-lined streets, separated from the city by the meandering River Torrens, this glamorous hotel provides the ultimate cosmopolitan lifestyle. Its North Terrace address, moments from Adelaide Oval and Rundle Mall, encourages effortless exploration on foot to discover nearby laneways packed with top-notch eateries and bars, trendy boutiques and must-see galleries housed within spectacular, history-rich buildings.
offer_address: 120 North Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide Stay near Park Lands with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drink
description:
Explore the southern edge of Adelaide's CBD at this hotel near the Adelaide Park Lands, offering views of the surrounding greenery, with Mount Lofty's summit and the vineyards of the Adelaide Hills visible in the distance.

Stop for a bite to eat at the onsite Terrace Bar & Kitchen and enjoy fresh local produce from the surrounding wine regions before venturing out to explore South Australia’s coastal capital. The city's most popular attractions like the Adelaide Central Market, Rundle Mall and Art Gallery of South Australia are all a short drive away.
offer_address: 208 South Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide Parkside Luxury near Rundle Mall with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Parking
description:
Embrace the intoxicating charm of Adelaide and experience one of the city's finest five-star stays at this Pullman jewel, boasting an award-winning brasserie and sleek guestrooms. 

The hotel’s positioning in Hindmarsh Square is exceptional: perfectly poised in Adelaide's trendy East End, this stylish hotel sits moments from city parklands and happening Rundle Street and Ebenezer Place - plus you'll be within easy reach of Adelaide Oval and the famed Adelaide Central Markets. Further afield, you can find yourself sipping wine in the picturesque Barossa Valley, Adelaide Hills or Mclaren Vale wine regions, all less than an hour's drive away.

Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts collection, Pullman Adelaide offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. You can stay active at the 24-hour fitness centre, take a dip in the refreshing indoor pool and unwind with a laze in the sauna. 

Treat yourself to the flavours of Europe at PARC Brasserie & Bar, toasting your escape with locally sourced wines and produce showcasing the best of South Australia's culinary delights.
offer_address: 16 Hindmarsh Square, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Australia's First Stadium Hotel: Adelaide Oval Historic Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Valet Parking
description:
Stay at Australia's first and only stadium hotel, located within the historic Adelaide Oval. The 138-room boutique hotel wraps gently around the eastern façade of the iconic stadium and is just moments from the CBD. Every room frames panoramic views of the Adelaide Parklands, with the formidable Saint Peter's Cathedral to the north and the city skyline and River Torrens to the south. Food and wine are at the very heart of the Oval Hotel offering. Extending across level three of Oval Hotel sits one of Adelaide’s most impressive dining experiences at Bespoke Wine Bar & Kitchen - with sweeping stadium views, a stylish bar and lounge - and a ground-level cafe overlooking the River Torrens' walking trails.

Perfectly positioned just moments from the city's endless urban delights, the hotel's central location lends itself to days spent wandering through Rundle Mall, afternoons admiring ever-changing exhibitions at the acclaimed art galleries and walks along River Torrens. Plus guests enjoy access to integrated facilities across the Adelaide Oval precinct including complimentary entry to Next Gen Lifestyle Club and its extensive gym, pool and spa.
offer_address: King William Road, North Adelaide, South Australia 5006, Australia

title: Retro Adelaide South Terrace City Break Overlooking the Park Lands with Daily Breakfast
description:
Stay in this city stay on the leafy fringes of the central Adelaide Park Lands. Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and Adelaide Central Market are all within 10 minutes, making this the perfect Adelaide escape. When you're done exploring, find contemporary amenities in your thoughtful and comfortable room.

In between exploring Australia's festival city and its surrounds, indulge in resort-style comforts at the neighbouring Hotel Alba with shared facilities. Savour Mediterranean flavours at the hotel's coastal-cool ela Restaurant or bathe in the sun-soaked pool. Make ela Bar your first stop before a night out on the town.
offer_address: 216-225 South Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Beachside Glenelg Getaway just 20 Minutes from Adelaide with Breakfast Hamper
description: Immerse yourself in coastal comfort at Nightcap at Watermark Glenelg, a cosy retreat where the sun-soaked shores of the iconic Glenelg beach are just a stone's throw away. Just 20 minutes from Adelaide's CBD, Glenelg feels like a different world, with beachfront dining, palm-lined walkways and a thriving nightlife scene. Spend days splashing in the turquoise waters and making footprints in the sand or exploring the many eateries along the bustling Jetty Road. Afterwards, return to your private abode where convenient amenities create a home-away-from-home experience.
offer_address: 631 Anzac Highway, Glenelg North 5045, South Australia, Australia

title: Last Chance: Grand Opening Vibe Adelaide near Rundle Street Mall with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
**Exclusive offer:** This is your last chance to book Adelaide's brand-new designer destination and Vibe's first-ever South Australia hotel, complete with an Australian first: a suspended heated pool with a pool deck with a communal plaza. Inside, look up in awe to the eye-catching chandelier above the lobby, illuminated to 'glow' differently over 24 hours, a must-book-in-advance Storehouse Flinders East restaurant and access to the likes of iconic Rundle Street Mall, Adelaide Central Market and Vardon Avenue.

Beyond this newly unvelieved retreat, you'll be within throwing (or sipping distance) of Adelaide's iconic wine regions - just a 30-40-minute drive to the rolling Adelaide Hills - so you can make the most of your city abode and venture out for a tipple or two in the Barossa within an hour.
offer_address: 260 Flinders Street, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Adelaide East End Apartment Escape near Rundle Mall
description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Adelaide's cultural precinct with a stay at the central Frome Apartments, located in the city's bustling East End. Find yourself within walking distance to Rundle Street's boutique shopping, the East End's buzzing dining scene, the foodie paradise of the Adelaide Central Markets and the iconic Adelaide Oval, plus the world-renowned wineries of Adelaide Hills are less than 30 minutes away. Catch the city tram to the glistening waters of Glenelg Beach or enjoy your central stay which is ideal for couples wanting to spend quality time together while also enjoying easy access to the best of Adelaide.
offer_address: 88 Frome Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Discover Adelaide’s Newest Apartments in the Heart of the City
description: Experience the brand new Avani Adelaide Residences, ideally located in the heart of the CBD. These ultra-stylish and super spacious apartments are the perfect way to experience South Australia's cosmopolitan capital. Stay in a new One Bedroom Apartment and enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival, complimentary minibar and a guaranteed, leisurely late 12pm checkout. Want to bring family or friends? Two Bedroom Apartment upgrades available.
offer_address: 176 Franklin St, Adelaide SA 5000

title: Contemporary Central Adelaide Self-Contained Apartments near Rundle Mall & Adelaide Oval
description:
Find yourself placed in Adelaide's vibrant West End when you stay at this boutique collection of self-contained apartments just minutes from the city's key landmarks. Franklin Apartments offers a home-away-from-home, with fully equipped kitchens, spacious bedrooms and in-room laundries. 

Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and the buzzing Adelaide Central Market are all within close reach, plus the world-renowned wineries of Adelaide Hills are less than 30 minutes away. This spacious retreat is ideal for families or groups wanting to spend quality time together, with some apartments offering space for up to six guests.

description:

Surrounded by parks and tree-lined streets, separated from the city by the meandering River Torrens, this glamorous hotel provides the ultimate cosmopolitan lifestyle. Its North Terrace address, moments from Adelaide Oval and Rundle Mall, encourages effortless exploration on foot to discover nearby laneways packed with top-notch eateries and bars, trendy boutiques and must-see galleries housed within spectacular, history-rich buildings.

title: Contemporary Cool Adelaide Art Hotel with Rooftop Bar, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Elevated above one of Adelaide's hottest cultural hubs, this boutique hotel celebrates the bold eccentricity of the Festival City. Bespoke art and odes to the city's heritage paint every surface, from reimagined 19th-century tessellated floors to custom installations from local contemporary artists.

Gastronomy at Hotel Indigo Adelaide Markets is defined by two trendy destinations - the modern Italian Market and Meander bar and eatery, curated by a Michelin-trained executive chef, and a retro-futuristic rooftop bar reminiscent of The Jetsons that overlooks the city skyline.

When you aren't admiring glittering views from the heated outdoor pool, take advantage of your location in the bustling Market Precinct by wandering down red brick alleys to trendy bars, microbreweries and iconic sites like Rundle Mall and Chinatown.
offer_address: 23-29 Market Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide: Three-Course Skyline Restaurant Dining Experience for Two with Bottle of Sparkling Wine
description: Send your tastebuds into a frenzy, savouring the best bites Adelaide has to offer, with a decadent three-course dinner at Skyline Restaurant. Be rewarded with 360-degree views across the glittering CBD while you dine on innovative dishes that shine a spotlight on South Australia's local produce. The restaurant itself enjoys an enviable location on the top floor of the iconic South Terrace building in Adelaide's CBD. The South Park Lands and rolling terrain of the Adelaide Hills create a stunning backdrop to your memorable meal. The menu is on a constant rotation, changed seasonally to reflect the best local produce available. Mouthwatering meals may include slow-cooked lamb shoulder, melt-in-your-mouth steak, and zesty asparagus and lemon risotto. Pour a fizzing flute of sparkling from your bottle of either Hentley Farm Blanc De Noir or Croser Sparkling and toast to a memorable evening.
offer_address: 1 South Tce, Adelaide SA 5000

vendor_name: TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide
title: Grand Opening: TRYP by Wyndham Adelaide CBD Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Be one of the first to experience the contemporary haven that is TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide, a brand-new city oasis in South Australia's vibrant and multicultural capital. Ideally situated in the heart of the entertainment and shopping district, with Rundle Mall on its doorstep and Adelaide Oval a short walk away, this urban sanctuary invites you to spend your days exploring the city streets, enjoying a picnic in the manicured parklands or sampling a world-renowned tipple at the National Wine Centre. When it's time to venture beyond the city limits, find yourself located less than an hour's drive from the famed Barossa Valley, McLaren Vale and the sun-soaked Glenelg beach.

In between exploring Australia's festival city and its surrounds, indulge in a blend of signature Wyndham luxury, upscale sophistication and inner-city living. Enjoy a grab-and-go meal at the Z Cafe or rejuvenate body and mind at the fitness centre. Make the Z Bar your first stop before a night out on the town, and return to your tranquil abode which features everything you could need for a relaxing stay.
location_description: TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide
offer_address: 266 Pulteney Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Contemporary Peppers Luxury in the Heart of Adelaide with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover South Australia’s cosmopolitan capital city as you indulge in quintessential Peppers luxury in the heart of Adelaide's CBD. Let this stylish hotel be your elegant launchpad as you explore the city's vibrant dining scene - why not start at the elegant TUTTO Cucina + Bar, serving up elevated Italian cuisine and located right inside the hotel. Or, if your escape calls for relaxation, retreat to the hotel's inviting heated indoor pool with a spa and sauna for the ultimate Adelaide bliss.

Whether you are a culture vulture, a foodie or a sports lover, Adelaide has it all - and Peppers Waymouth Hotel will take you right to the heart of it. Within walking distance, explore sites such as the Art Gallery of South Australia, or catch a game at Adelaide Oval. Do as the locals do, and head to Peel Street for your cocktail fix or complete your Adelaide trip with a visit to the lush Adelaide Hills: this leafy destination, just an hour’s drive from the city, brims with wineries where you can get cosy with a glass of red.
offer_address: 55 Waymouth Street, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Five-Star Pullman Stay in the Heart of Adelaide CBD with Daily Breakfast
description:
If you’re looking for a sophisticated central Adelaide city stay, look no further than Pullman Adelaide. Perfectly poised in Adelaide's trendy East End, this stylish hotel sits moments from the buzz of the CBD, city parklands, and the bars and boutiques of the eclectic Rundle Street and Ebenezer Place.

There’s plenty to discover beyond the hotel, but this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy. Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts collection, Pullman Adelaide offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. Treat yourself to global dining at Salt Restaurant or opt for something more relaxed with a drink at Salt Bar & Lounge. Enjoy the 24-hour fitness centre in addition to the restorative sauna and steam room, or start the day with some lengths in the relaxing 13.5m indoor lap pool.
offer_address: 16 Hindmarsh Square, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Stylish Stay Next to Adelaide Airport with Buffet Breakfast
description: Embrace style and convenience during your Adelaide getaway with Atura Adelaide Airport. Featuring a modern atmosphere and free-flowing communal spaces, you’ll be able to relax and rejuvenate while you take in all Adelaide has to offer or prepare for a flight. Stay for one or two nights with daily buffet breakfast and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout included.
offer_address: 1 Atura Circuit Adelaide Airport 5950 South Australia Australia

title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Sofitel Adelaide with Daily Breakfast & Room Upgrade
description:
South Australia’s ultra-cool capital has rightfully earned its place as the world’s third most livable city for 2021 - and you're invited to experience it for yourself with a French-inspired twist at the newly-opened Sofitel Adelaide. Its Currie Street address, moments from the River Torrens and Light Square, encourages effortless exploration on foot to discover nearby laneways packed with top-notch eateries and bars, trendy boutiques and must-see galleries housed within spectacular, history-rich buildings. For adventures beyond the urban grid, the world-class wine regions and glorious sandy stretches offer this unmissable destination a change of pace and a different perspective.

Retire to your centrally located sanctuary where no detail has been spared at the end of each day. Each of the rooms offers a contemporary spin on French sophistication in signature Sofitel style, and the exceptional facilities are sure to impress. Get a taste for French fare where South Australian produce plays a leading role at Garçon Bleu, drop into Déjà Vu on the ground floor for a glass of champagne, or gaze across the city as you dive into the lap pool on level five.
offer_address: 108 Currie St, Adelaide SA 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide: Sofitel Two-Course French-Inspired Lunch with Glass of Premium House Wine for Two
description:
Revel in a sensational two-course lunch with one glass of wine and get a taste for modern French-inspired dishes at Garçon Bleu, located within the recently opened five-star Sofitel Adelaide. Step inside this elegant eatery and savour vibrant and contemporary French fare while admiring abstract wall art, plush blue velvet seating, a partially mirrored ceiling and gold accents throughout the restaurant.

Enjoy a gastronomical experience like no other, with a modern Australian twist on dishes with signature French flair. Choose between a selection of appetising dishes glazed duck breast with sauce a l’orange or fillet de boeuf with celeriac and sauce Madère for your first course, while sipping on a glass of a premium house-selected wine. For your second course, choose from a selection of sweet treats, which may include decadent chocolate fondant with cocoa nibs and apple tarte tartin with crème fraîche ice cream to perfectly round out your experience.
offer_address: Level 9, 108 Currie Street, Adelaide, SA, 5000

title: Sophisticated MGallery by Sofitel Adelaide Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
South Australia’s vibrant capital city is yours to explore from the elegant halls of the five-star The Playford - MGallery by Sofitel, nestled on Adelaide's sought-after North Terrace. Part of the prestigious MGallery Sofitel brand, this beautiful hotel is a boutique city gem blending old-world charm and modern-day comforts in the heart of Adelaide’s cultural precinct. Here, you will have the best of Adelaide at your feet, with elegant rooms fitted with modern luxuries to return to after days spent exploring.

Your stylish escape includes daily breakfast, a welcome drink per person, daily parking and a leisurely 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with kids?** Upgrade to a Twin Queen Room for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under) with a bonus Playford Feast lunch included.
offer_address: 120 North Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Stylish Adelaide CBD Stay with Daily Breakfast
description: Boutique style, contemporary elegance and rooftop views await you at the Majestic Roof Garden Hotel. Currently rated in Adelaide’s top 10 hotels on TripAdvisor, this stylish stay is a true hidden gem in the heart of the city. title: Adelaide Stay near Rundle Street with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Garden
description:
Nestled in Adelaide’s vibrant East End, the Majestic Roof Garden Hotel offers an exceptional stay with breathtaking rooftop garden views. On one side, enjoy sweeping vistas of the rolling Adelaide Hills, while the other reveals the twinkling lights of the city’s lively streets. 

The hotel’s Culshaws restaurant celebrates fresh, local produce, complemented by an exclusive wine list featuring selections from renowned regions like the Barossa Valley, McLaren Vale and the Adelaide Hills. 

Perfectly located within walking distance of Rundle Mall, Adelaide Zoo, the National Wine Centre, the Art Gallery of South Australia, Adelaide Oval and the Botanic Gardens, the hotel offers easy access to the city’s top attractions.
offer_address: 55 Frome Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

This urban retreat is spectacularly located on bustling Franklin Street, meaning you will be able to walk to cool bars, award-winning restaurants and high-end shops. The world-class Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall, Adelaide Casino, the 150-year-old South Australian Museum ⁠- home to the largest collection of Indigenous Australian cultural artefacts anywhere in the country ⁠- and Adelaide Zoo are also within easy reach, making this stylish property the perfect base to explore all that this vibrant city offers.

When you're ready to relax, retreat to one of the ultra-stylish and expansive rooms and suites, modern spaces boasting uninterrupted views over Adelaide’s skyline as well as the facilities to make your city escape even more unforgettable.

title: Contemporary Central Adelaide Self-Contained Apartments near Rundle Mall & Adelaide Oval
description: Find yourself placed in Adelaide's vibrant West End when you stay at this boutique collection of self-contained apartments just minutes from the city's key landmarks. Franklin Apartments offers a home-away-from-home, with fully equipped kitchens, spacious bedrooms and in-room laundries. Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and the buzzing Adelaide Central Market are all within close reach, plus the world-renowned wineries of Adelaide Hills are less than 30 minutes away. This spacious retreat is ideal for families or groups wanting to spend quality time together, with some apartments offering space for up to six guests.
offer_address: 36 Franklin Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Contemporary Adelaide East End Studio Retreat near Rundle Mall with Welcome Bottle of Wine
description:
Experience the eclectic charms of Adelaide's East End from this studio stay, occupying a prime location near the CBD. Be within mere steps of the Rundle Mall strip, indulge in Friday night drinks or morning coffee at Ebenezer Palace, or journey a little further and reach foodie heaven at the Adelaide Central Market.

Hop onboard the city tram to reach the shores of Glenelg Beach, stroll through the restored Victorian glasshouse at the nearby Botanic Gardens, or explore the local culinary scene with chef-hatted restaurants less than 10 minutes' drive away. With exciting activities everywhere, bookend fun days by resting in your well-appointed apartment and gazing at the city from your Juliette balcony.
offer_address: 88 Frome Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Boutique Adelaide Oval Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
A memorable stay awaits at the recently unveiled Oval Hotel, a boutique property nestled within the walls of one of the city’s most iconic landmarks - Adelaide Oval. Perfectly positioned just moments from the endless urban delights found within the city, the location lends itself to days spent wandering through premier retail precincts including Rundle Mall, afternoons admiring ever-changing exhibitions at the acclaimed art galleries and museums, and evenings sampling regional delights at the city’s lively restaurants and bars.

Each one of the sophisticated rooms has been expertly designed to ensure total relaxation. The stunning vistas of the surrounding heritage-listed parklands or city skyline are simply breathtaking, enhanced by the addition of intuitive in-room technology and contemporary interiors.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with a delightful breakfast - your choice of continental platter or plated hot dish with espresso coffee, tea and juice
- Unwind with a complimentary drink in the Hotel lounge overlooking Adelaide’s parklands and St Peter’s Cathedral
- Enjoy the luxury of included valet parking so you don't have to worry about finding a park

**Studio King Upgrade Bonus:** Upgrade to a Studio King Room, offering breathtaking views over either the river and leafy parklands or St Peter's Cathedral, and receive A$50 drinks and dining credit to use onsite at Five Regions Restaurant or Bespoke Wine Bar & Restaurant.

**Gourmet Upgrade:** Sample the very best of South Australia's acclaimed regional produce with an included five-course degustation at the hotel's Five Regions Restaurant, plus enjoy a bonus A$50 food and drinks credit, when you choose the Gourmet Upgrade Package.
offer_address: King William Road, North Adelaide, South Australia 5006, Australia

vendor_name: TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide
title: Stylish Adelaide CBD Stay with Onsite Mexican Bar & Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description:
Treat yourself to a luxurious city oasis escape to South Australia's vibrant and multicultural capital. Ideally situated in the heart of the entertainment and shopping district, with Rundle Mall on its doorstep and Adelaide Oval a short walk away, this urban sanctuary invites you to spend your days exploring the city streets, enjoying a picnic in the manicured parklands or sampling a world-renowned tipple at the National Wine Centre.

Whether you're an urban explorer visiting the renowned architecture and church spires, a wine-lover sampling the nearby tipples or simply drawn to the area's incredible live music and arts scene, Adelaide is the perfect destination for travellers of all persuasions - and there's simply no better place to take it all in than at TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide.

Make Adelaide's newest Mexican venue, Mamacita Restaurant & Bar, your first stop before a night out on the town and return to your tranquil abode which features everything you could need for a relaxing stay.
location_description: TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide
offer_address: 266 Pulteney Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Five-Star Hilton Adelaide Elegance with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Indulge in a blend of signature Hilton luxury, upscale sophistication and inner-city living at Hilton Adelaide. Ideally situated in the heart of the entertainment and shopping district, overlooking Victoria Square, this luxurious sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city on your doorstep.

Whether you're an urban explorer visiting the renowned architecture and church spires, a wine-lover sampling the nearby Barossa Valley’s unique flavours, or simply drawn to the area's incredible live music and arts scene, Adelaide is the perfect destination for travellers of all persuasions - and there's simply no better place to take it all in that the five-star Hilton Adelaide. With its lavish outdoor pool, modern fitness centre, casual tipples at The Collins Bar, expert chefs preparing signature dishes in Coal Cellar + Grill, as well as world-class service, this hotel ensures a stay you'll never forget.
offer_address: 233 Victoria Square, Adelaide SA 5000

title: Boutique Adelaide Art Series Stay with Four-Course Dining Experience
description:
Welcome to Adelaide’s only Art Series hotel, The Watson - a boutique hotel that champions the work of Aboriginal painter Yannima Pikarli Tommy Watson. One of Adelaide’s coolest city-fringe pads, with the leafy Walkerville Terrace shopping precinct on its doorstep and North Terrace’s cultural boulevard, upcoming galleries, dining institutions and in-the-know boutiques within easy reach, this is the ultimate boutique stay overlooking the majestic Adelaide Hills.

Stay in sophistication surrounded by vibrant, original Watson artwork and enjoy a welcome bottle of local wine on arrival, complimentary parking for one car throughout your stay and a luxuriously late 1pm checkout. Plus, enjoy a one-time four-course banquet dining experience with a welcome cocktail for two adults at the top-rated L'italy restaurant, voted among Australia's top 50 restaurants by Weekend Australian magazine 2019.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the spacious Deluxe Studio Twin Suite or Two-Bedroom Balcony Suite for four people.
offer_address: 33 Warwick St, Walkerville SA 5081

title: Five-Star Adelaide Stay with Aladdin the Musical Tickets
description: Enjoy a stay at The Playford Adelaide, with two tickets to Disney’s Aladdin the Musical included. An award-winning hotel, this five-star property is managed by Accor’s prestigious MGallery Sofitel brand and sits on the vibrant North Terrace, one of the city’s most sought-after locations. The Adelaide Oval, Convention Centre, Elder Park, Sky City Casino and Rundle Mall are all within walking distance. Most importantly, it takes under ten minutes to walk to the Adelaide Festival Centre, where you’ll head to enjoy your included performance of Aladdin. Also included in your stay is a welcome drink on arrival at the hotel and a complimentary noon check-out, allowing for a leisurely morning on your day of departure.
offer_address: 120 North Terrace, Adelaide SA 5000

title: Top-Rated Adelaide Apartment Stay in the Heart of Australia's Most Liveable City
description:
Not all city escapes are made the same and after an ultra-stylish stay at Miller Apartments Adelaide, you’ll soon discover what an unforgettable urban escape should be. This top-rated property - currently ranked in Adelaide's top five properties on Tripadvisor - is superbly located right in the heart of Australia's (and the world's third) most liveable city, close to Adelaide Oval and Rundle Mall, making it the perfect base for couples seeking a romantic escape or groups looking to discover the city in style.

Slip into the cosmopolitan rhythm of the capital as you explore the burgeoning small-bar and restaurant scene, roam through exceptional shopping precincts and get a taste for world-class cultural experiences within moments of your doorstep. When you're not discovering the likes of the Art Gallery of South Australia or Adelaide Central Market, recharge at Miller Apartments Adelaide, where you'll find a small onsite fitness centre plus complimentary access to a nearby Goodlife Gym and convenient undercover parking for day trips to the Adelaide Hills or the vine-laced Barossa Valley.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Toast your escape with a bottle of red wine on arrival
- Indulge your sweet side with complimentary welcome chocolates
- Forget about parking woes with complimentary secure parking for one vehicle
- Make the most of your stay with late 12pm checkout

**Want to make your stay extra special?** Upgrade to the One-Bedroom Executive Suite or sky-high Two-Bedroom Executive Suite and receive a five-course tasting menu dinner for two with a glass of Adelaide Hills sparkling wine each at Georges on Waymouth restaurant (an additional five-course tasting menu dinner per person will need to be purchased for the third and fourth guest in the Two-Bedroom Executive Suite).
offer_address: 16 Hindley Street Adelaide SA 5000 Australia

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Modern Adelaide CBD Glamour with Resort-Style Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:

Radiating contemporary glamour, this minimalist-chic hotel blends the charm of an elegant countryside retreat with the convenience of an urban escape, with cultural and dining hotspots on your doorstep.

In between exploring Australia's 'Festival City' and its surrounds, indulge in resort-style luxuries at your inner-city retreat. Savour Mediterranean flavours at the coastal-cool Ela or bathe in the sun-soaked outdoor pool. Make the bar at Ela your first stop before a night out on the town, then return to your private oasis where a spacious balcony with park or city views awaits.

When it's time to venture beyond the city limits, find yourself located less than an hour's drive from the famed Barossa Valley, McLaren Vale and the sun-soaked Glenelg beach.

In between exploring Australia's festival city and its surrounds, indulge in resort-style luxuries at your inner-city retreat. title: Australia's First Stadium Hotel: Adelaide Oval Historic Stay with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience a stay like no other at Australia’s first and only stadium hotel, located within the iconic Adelaide Oval. The Oval Hotel blends world-class accommodation with the energy of a living stadium, offering an unparalleled perspective of one of Australia's most historic sporting venues.

On level three, indulge in one of Adelaide’s most remarkable dining experiences at Bespoke Wine Bar & Kitchen. Here, sweeping stadium views meet a stylish bar and lounge. At ground level, enjoy a relaxed atmosphere at the cafe overlooking the River Torrens and its scenic walking trails.

Positioned moments from the city's vibrant attractions, every room is designed to showcase panoramic views of the Adelaide parklands. Guests are treated to sights of the majestic Saint Peter’s Cathedral to the north, and the sparkling city skyline and River Torrens to the south. 

Take advantage of exclusive access to integrated facilities across the Adelaide Oval precinct, including entry to the Next Gen Lifestyle Club, which features a fitness centre, pool and spa.
offer_address: King William Road, North Adelaide, South Australia 5006, Australia

title: Adelaide East End Apartment Escape near Rundle Mall & Botanic Gardens
description: Immerse yourself in Adelaide's buzzy East End with a central studio escape. Just a stone's throw to Friday night drinks or morning coffee at Ebenezer Place, and walking distance to the bustling Rundle Mall strip, you're also a short journey to foodie heaven at the Adelaide Central Markets. Catch the city tram to the glistening waters of Glenelg Beach or stroll through the elegantly restored Victorian glasshouse at the nearby Botanic Gardens. With renowned wineries in every direction, bookend fun days by resting in your plush, light-filled apartment and gazing at the city lights from your Juliette balcony.

title: Award-Winning Adelaide Boutique Suite Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Dining Credit
description:
An escape to South Australia’s charming capital beckons with a sophisticated five-star suite stay at this newly refurbished boutique retreat. Inspired by the city's rich artistic heritage, this glamorous hotel dazzles with art-nouveau touches, gilded accents and bespoke hospitality unlike anywhere else.

The facilities are exceptional - savour pared-back European-inspired dishes served with modern flair at Luma Restaurant and Bar (awarded One Chef's Hat by The Australian Good Food Guide in 2024) or head to Health Club for a dip in the hotel's magnificent indoor pool.

Surrounded by parks and tree-lined streets and separated from the city by the meandering River Torrens, The Playford Adelaide - MGallery provides the ultimate Adelaide escape. Its North Terrace address, just moments from Adelaide Oval and Rundle Mall, encourages effortless exploration, with nearby laneways packed with eateries, bars, boutiques and galleries.
offer_address: 120 North Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide: Award-Winning Aurora Restaurant Six-Course Tasting Menu Experience for Two with Sparkling Wine
description:
Indulge in the best of South Australian produce with a six-course tasting menu and welcome sparkling wine at Aurora Restaurant, located in Adelaide's vibrant Light Square. Founded on the pillars of sustainability, local produce and social responsibility, the team at Aurora aim to create memorable dining experiences that nourish and engage. Led by South African native, head chef Brendan Wessels, take your tastebuds on a journey that is sure to delight - think delicately smoked Kinkawooka mussels against the acidity of last-season tomatoes, or rich Lowan Park chicken cream offset by scorched onion and pickled walnut.

Despite being the new kid on the block, Aurora has become somewhat of an institution in the South Australian foodie scene, with the restaurant being awarded three Gourmet Traveller Restaurant Awards in 2022, including a coveted Chef's Hat. Positioned in Adelaide's trendy West End, this beautiful open-plan restaurant combines stone surfaces, Australian flora and artful light shades to make for the perfect luxe setting for your six-course dining experience.
offer_address: 63 Light Square, Adelaide, SA, 5000

title: Modern Escape in the Heart of Adelaide CBD with Daily Breakfast

You’ll be perfectly placed to explore the best of the CBD from this centrally-located hotel. Shop up a storm at Rundle Mall, witness a sports game or live concert at Adelaide Oval, or sample fresh produce at Adelaide Central Market. If you feel like venturing out of the CBD, award-winning wineries await in the Adelaide Hills wine region, only a 40-minute drive away.

description:

The hotel overlooks Victoria Square and is minutes from Central Market and Rundle Mall. Plus, there's an abundance of wine bars and shopping all within walking distance. When you return from your adventures, relax over a coffee at the Meeting Point Café or refuel at the Hangar Bar & Grill.
offer_address: 1 Atura Circuit Adelaide Airport 5950 South Australia Australia

title: Five-Star Stay within Iconic Adelaide Oval
description: A memorable stay awaits at the Oval Hotel, a bespoke property nestled within the walls of one of the city’s most iconic landmarks - Adelaide Oval. As Australia’s first stadium hotel, Oval Hotel offers guests a distinctly South Australian, one-of-a-kind accommodation experience and places sports lovers in the heart of the action. Perfectly positioned just moments from the endless urban delights, the hotel also boasts onsite fine-dining; Bespoke Wine Bar & Kitchen and Five Regions Restaurants.
offer_address: King William Road, North Adelaide, South Australia 5006, Australia

title: Stamford Grand Adelaide Beachfront Escape Just 20 Minutes from Adelaide CBD
description: Experience the grandeur of the Stamford Grand Adelaide Hotel, a beachfront retreat on the shores of Adelaide's vibrant Glenelg Beach. With its unrivalled location in the heart of Glenelg, this renowned hotel offers an idyllic blend of coastal charm and city sophistication. Explore the bustling Jetty Road, brimming with boutique shops, or take a leisurely tram ride to Adelaide's city centre. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Horizon Cocktail Lounge, where you can soak in panoramic ocean views.
offer_address: 2 Jetty Road Moseley Square, Glenelg, South Australia 5045, Australia

title: Stylish Award-Winning Apartment Escape in the Heart of Adelaide
description: Discover an unforgettable self-contained urban escape at the top-rated, ultra-stylish Miller Apartments Adelaide, superbly located right in the city centre. Each recently renovated apartment  boasts a dazzling array of top-notch facilities, including fully equipped kitchens and separate living areas. Explore Adelaide's brilliant collection of bars, restaurants and galleries, roam through exceptional shopping precincts and get a taste of world-class cultural experiences - all within metres of your doorstep.
offer_address: 16 Hindley Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Contemporary Peppers Luxury in the Heart of Adelaide with Onsite Restaurant & Indoor Heated Pool
description:
Discover South Australia’s cosmopolitan capital city as you indulge in quintessential Peppers luxury in the heart of Adelaide's CBD. Start your days at the elegant TUTTO Cucina + Bar, serving up elevated Italian cuisine and located right inside the hotel. Or, if your escape calls for relaxation, retreat to the hotel's inviting heated indoor pool with a spa and sauna for the ultimate Adelaide bliss.

Whether you are a culture vulture, a foodie or a sports lover, Adelaide has it all - and Peppers Waymouth Hotel will take you right to the heart of it. Within walking distance, explore sites such as the Art Gallery of South Australia, or catch a game at Adelaide Oval. Do as the locals do, and head to Peel Street for your cocktail fix or complete your Adelaide trip with a visit to the lush Adelaide Hills.
offer_address: 55 Waymouth Street, Adelaide, South Australia, Australia, 5000

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Adelaide City Centre
title: Sophisticated Adelaide West End Escape
description: Striking the perfect balance between sophisticated comfort and an unbeatable location, Holiday Inn Express Adelaide City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is an idyllic city break in the vibrant West End. Situated in the heart of the buzzing CBD and a short stroll from Adelaide’s premier shopping mall and historic Italianate arcades, this stylish launchpad is perfectly placed with the best wining, dining and entertainment the city has to offer at its doorstep.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Adelaide City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 30 Blyth Street, Adelaide, SA 5000 Australia

title: Central Adelaide Escape Overlooking Park Lands
description: Stay in a leafy corner of the CBD at The Terrace Hotel Adelaide, located on the verdant fringes of the sprawling Adelaide Park Lands. This stylish hotel offers soaring views over the greenery, while Mount Lofty and the patchwork vineyards of the Adelaide Hills are visible in the distance. Stop for a bite to eat at Terrace Bar & Kitchen and enjoy fresh local produce from the surrounding wine regions, before venturing out to explore South Australia's vibrant capital.
offer_address: 208 South Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Stylish Central Adelaide Apartment Stay
description: Find yourself placed in Adelaide's vibrant west end when you stay at the homely Franklin Apartments. These self-contained apartments offer a home-away-from-home feeling, with each room offering fabulous facilities, including fully equipped kitchens and laundry services. Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and the buzzing Adelaide Central Markets are all within 10 minutes and the world-renowned wineries of Adelaide Hills and the picturesque shores of Glenelg are less than 30 minutes away.
offer_address: 36 Franklin Street, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Chic Adelaide Art Series Self-Contained Suites Overlooking Adelaide Hills with Lap Pool
description:
Indulge in the perfect blend of art and luxury at this boutique hotel, which champions the work of Aboriginal painter, Yannima Pikarli Tommy Watson. One of Adelaide’s coolest city-fringe pads, with the leafy Walkerville Terrace shopping precinct on its doorstep and North Terrace’s cultural boulevard, dining institutions and in-the-know boutiques within easy reach, this is the ultimate urban retreat, overlooking the majestic Adelaide Hills.

Admire the striking artwork of Watson and the vibrant colour splashes adorned on the walls, go for a swim in the lap pool, work up a sweat in the gym, or relax and unwind in your well-appointed suite or apartment. If you wish, you can venture out and explore the nearby Adelaide Botanic Garden and the bustling Adelaide Central Market, both a short drive away.
offer_address: 33 Warwick St, Walkerville, Adelaide SA 5081, Australia

title: Centrally-Located Adelaide Retreat near Rundle Mall & Convention Centre
description:
Find yourself in the heart of it all with an elegant stay at this chic Adelaide city oasis perfectly situated on North Terrace, mere steps from the Convention Centre and the iconic Adelaide Oval. Be it for business or leisure, take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the enchanting South Australian capital to the fullest.

Kick back and relax in the hotel's well-appointed rooms and suites, go cafe-hopping or tuck into pub classics at the famous Stonegrill. If you wish to venture further, the charming Barossa Valley and its renowned wineries are an hour away while closer to the hotel, head to Haigh's Chocolate Visitor Centre to learn all about the craft of chocolate-making and indulge in some retail therapy at Rundle Street Market.
offer_address: 125 North Terrace, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Boutique Heritage Escape in Heart of CBD near Adelaide Central Market
description: You're perfectly placed to explore the best of South Australia’s lively capital with a stay at the elegant Adina Apartment Hotel Adelaide Treasury, housed within one of the state’s most historic buildings. Refreshingly modern apartments and studios offer a welcoming home-away-from-home feeling, while the conveniences of an indoor pool, gym and onsite restaurant will elevate your stay to new levels of comfort. The location is nothing short of superb, with the famed Adelaide Central Market, Rundle Mall and an abundance of trendy wine bars and newly opened cafés all within walking distance. When you want to taste South Australia’s best drops straight from the source, Adelaide is the perfect base for day trips to the Barossa Valley, Adelaide Hills and McLaren Vale.
offer_address: 2 Flinders St, Adelaide SA 5000 Australia

title: Sophisticated Adelaide Escape with Suspended Bridge Pool
description: Escape to South Australia's vibrant and multicultural capital with a stay at Vibe Hotel Adelaide. This stylish and modern hotel enjoys a prime position in the heart of the City of Churches, famous for being the only capital city entirely surrounded by parklands. Spend days exploring the city, tasting some of Australia's best drops in the nearby wine regions, or relaxing on golden beaches, before returning to your urban haven to enjoy brand-new facilities or relax by the innovative suspended pool.
offer_address: 260 Flinders Street, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Stylish Adelaide Retreat with Rooftop Bar
description: Escape to South Australia’s picturesque coastal cosmopolitan city with a stay in the eclectic Hotel Indigo Adelaide Markets, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly located in the heart of the market precinct, this retreat is the gateway to your gastronomic journey with the Adelaide Central Market right next door. Spend your days exploring, take a dip in the refreshing coastal waters, and indulge in locally sourced South Australian seafood at the sophisticated onsite restaurant and rooftop bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Adelaide Markets, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 23-29 Market Street, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Heritage Glamour in the Heart of Adelaide with Rooftop Bar
description: Experience grandeur, elegance and luxury in the heart of Adelaide at the Mayfair Hotel - a prestigious heritage-listed building steeped in history. The hotel boasts an unparalleled location where you can spend hours indulging in retail therapy at the nearby City Cross Mall or evenings spent meandering along Hindley Street. Or, retreat to the hotel and enjoy a glamorous High Tea at Mayflower Restaurant, or cocktails at Hennessy Rooftop Bar.
offer_address: 45 King William Street, Adelaide 5000, South Australia, Australia

title: Beachside Glenelg Apartment Escape Just 20 Minutes from Adelaide CBD
description:
With shimmering waters stretching as far as the eye can see, and the bustling high street brimming with delicious cafes and charming boutiques -  experience the best of South Australia's coastal charm with a beachside Glenelg stay. Just 20 minutes from Adelaide CBD, Glenelg feels like a different world, with beachfront dining, palm-lined walkways and a thriving nightlife scene.

When you're not making footprints in the sand along the beach or exploring the many eateries along the bustling Jetty Road, take a dip in your hotel's heated indoor swimming pool or soak in the bubbling jacuzzi. Afterwards, return to your apartment sanctuary, where thoughtful amenities create a home-away-from-home experience.
offer_address: 25-29 Colley Terrace, Glenelg, South Australia 5045, Australia

title: Sophisticated Adelaide City Retreat Overlooking South Terrace Parklands
description: Overlooking the serene green of the city’s rolling parklands, Hotel Alba Adelaide offers guests a resort-style stay right in the heart of the city's vibrant South Terrace. Boasting 99 stylish guest rooms, each boasting a spacious private balcony and coffee machine, this minimalist-chic hotel blends the charm of an elegant countryside retreat with the convenience of an urban escape. Head to historic Central Market for foodie delights or nearby Himeji Garden for a slice of traditional Japan in Adelaide.
offer_address: 226 South Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia

title: Adelaide CBD Apartment Escape within North Terrace Culture Precinct
description: Adelaide's buzzing urban scene is bubbling with multicultural food outlets, a vibing live-music scene and a packed festival calendar - and all of this can be enjoyed from Oaks Adelaide Horizons Suites, located in the heart of the CBD. This stylish, apartment-style hotel is located along North Terrace, the hub for culture and arts. Right up the street, you'll discover the Art Gallery of South Australia, the National War Memorial, theatres, cinemas and the iconic Trinity Church. When you're not exploring Adelaide's sights, cook yourself dinner in your self-contained apartment or take a dip in the refreshing indoor swimming pool.
offer_address: 104 North Terrace, Adelaide SA 5000 Australia

title: Contemporary Adelaide Self-Contained Apartments Only Minutes from CBD
description:
Experience the vibrant pulse of Adelaide with a sophisticated self-contained stay in the bustling West End. Situated a short stroll from Adelaide’s premier shopping mall and historic Italianate arcades, this stylish launchpad is perfectly placed with the best of the city at its doorstep.

Spend your days exploring the city and stop by the Adelaide Central Market to sample local produce, before retreating to your cosy apartment for that home-away-from-home feeling. Each space includes fully equipped kitchens and laundry services for easy Adelaide exploring.
offer_address: 255 Hindley Street, Adelaide , South Australia, 5000, Australia

title: Modern Pullman Stay in the Heart of Adelaide CBD with European-Inspired Restaurant & Indoor Pool
description:
If you’re looking for a sophisticated central Adelaide city stay, look no further than this stylish East End escape. Perfectly poised moments from the buzz of the CBD, city parklands, and the bars and boutiques of the eclectic Rundle Street and Ebenezer Place, there’s plenty to discover beyond the hotel, but this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy.

Pullman Adelaide offers guests a first-class experience. Treat yourself to European-inspired dining at PARC Brasserie & Bar. Enjoy the 24-hour fitness centre in addition to the restorative sauna and steam room, or start the day with some lengths in the indoor lap pool.
offer_address: 16 Hindmarsh Square, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia
